name: Fresh Corn Salad
author: HP_imagines
summary: I created this fresh corn salad to serve with our lobster dinners that we have about once a month (seafood Sunday).  I wanted to do something outside of the traditional sides like corn on the cob and potato. It's now a family favorite! Goes well with a grilled steak or tuna steak as well. The combination of sweet with the corn and salty with the feta is an unexpected delight!
ingredients: 1 ½ pints cherry tomatoes, halved lengthwise
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil
Add corn and cook for 10 minutes
Drain and cool under running water so it's easier to handle
Cut corn off the cobs into a large bowl
Add tomatoes, green onions, cilantro, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper and mix together
Add feta cheese just before serving
